inclusion.criterion: neck pain complaint persists for at least 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pain: visual analog scale (VAS) was used to detect the patients pain intensity
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: included in the physiotherapy and rehabilitation program due to NP in the last 6 months
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: having a diagnosis of vertebrobasilar artery failure, being diagnosed with cervical stenosis
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has neck pain complaint for at least 3 months and is undergoing physiotherapy due to NP in the last 6 months. However, they have a diagnosis of vertebrobasilar artery failure and cervical stenosis which may trigger exclusion.
